channel.title: Hugo on blog
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on blog

item.title: My First Blog Post
item.description:
What to say

I love the idea of this blog. A vast expanse where only my thoughts can swim. I am struggling with mental health now, but I am sure it will pass. It always passes. I can only focus on Simba, and the other few fully positive things in my life. I also have to focus on school, job hunting, and moving into the new house next week. I am currently 3 months into my journey of praying everyday, and there have only been a few slip ups.
